title: BlazBlue
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB)  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".   BlazBlue is the next-generation, hi-res 2D fighter from the creators of the best-selling Guilty Gear franchise. Take control of 12 unique combatants with a variety of offensive and defensive options at your disposal, including the character specific “Drive Attacks”. Experience the epic tale of each character as told through the console exclusive story mode.

childDownloads.title: Additional character colors 2 (type A)
childDownloads.description: Includes 4 additional color palettes based on the flags of various European countries for Rachel, Tager, Litchi, and Arakune. (This key will only work with the latest title update.) There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Additional character colors 2 (type B)
childDownloads.description: Includes 4 additional color palettes based on the flags of various European countries for Ragna, Jin, Noel, and Carl. (This key will only work with the latest title update.) There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: BlazBlue Picture Pack 1
childDownloads.description: BlazBlue icon pack one! The 12 main characters. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: BlazBlue Picture Pack 3
childDownloads.description: BlazBlue icon pack three! This one has the supporting characters. This pack has a total of 18 characters. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: BlazBlue Premium Theme 1
childDownloads.description: BlazBlue premium theme round one! A calm background that makes good use of geometric designs. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.description: BlazBlue premium theme round two! An orthodox theme that uses the 3D backgrounds of BlazBlue.  There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: BlazBlue Premium Theme 3
childDownloads.description: BlazBlue premium theme round three! An orthodox theme that uses the 3D backgrounds found in BlazBlue.  There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: BlazBlue Premium Theme 4
childDownloads.description: BlazBlue premium theme round 4! The design is based on the "Teach me, Miss Litchi" episodes and uses cute SD characters. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Other Unlimited Characters Unlocked
childDownloads.description: This enables Unlimited versions of the following characters: Jin, Noel, Taokaka, tagger, Litchi, Arakune, Bang, and Carl. (This key will only work with the latest title update.) There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
